detail_desc: Vest tops in soft, organic cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and armholes.
Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Push-up bra in lace with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps that are lace-covered at the back, and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
5-pocket denim jeans with a regular waist, button fly and straight legs.
Thin metal rings, three decorated with pearly plastic beads.
Double-breasted coat in woven fabric with a brushed finish. Notch lapels, welt side pockets and a single back vent. Unlined.
Wide jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Calf-length skirt in a softly draping viscose weave. High waist with concealed press-studs and ties at one side, a wrapover front and asymmetric hem. Unlined.
Court shoes with pointed toes and block heels. Satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 8 cm.
Cardigan in a soft rib knit with dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. No buttons.
T-shirt in slub cotton jersey with sewn-in turn-ups at the sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Sleeveless top in soft, printed jersey with a tie detail at the front of the hem.
Sunglasses with matt plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Short top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood and long raglan sleeves with ribbed cuffs. The top is layered over a longer, sewn-in strappy top.

Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a print motif on the front and soft brushed inside. Wrapover, jersey-lined funnel collar with a decorative drawstring, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Metal hoop earrings in various sizes and designs. Diameter from 1.2 cm to approx. 3 cm.
Straight-cut top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a high, ribbed collar and zip at the top. Dropped shoulders, long, slightly wider sleeves and ribbed cuffs. Soft brushed inside.

Knee-length dress in an airy weave with a V-neck, gathered yoke and long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Elasticated seam and a detachable belt with sparkly stone decorations under the bust. Partly lined.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a soft cotton blend with a print motif. Pile-lined hood with a decorative drawstring, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sleeveless top in cotton jersey with a print motif. Frill trim around the armholes.
Ribbed vest top in soft, organic cotton jersey with a lace trim around the neckline and armholes and an overlocked hem. Gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Classic T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Shirt in premium cotton Oxford with a button-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Short, straight-cut jacket in cotton twill with a collar and zip down the front. Zipped side pockets, an inner pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Viscose lining.
Soft bralette in lace with adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back and decorative lacing at the front.
Nightshirt in soft jersey with short sleeves and slits at the hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short-sleeved bodysuit in soft organic cotton jersey with a text print on the front. Opening with press-studs at one side and press-studs at the crotch.
Fitted top in organic cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and a V-neck with a lace trim.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and press-studs at the crotch.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and string back.
Strapless, fully lined bandeau bikini top with lightly padded cups with removable inserts and side support. No fasteners.
Body in soft mesh and microfibre with a deep V-neck, wide shoulder straps that twist at the back and a lined gusset with press-studs.
Trousers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Fitted top in ribbed jersey made from a cotton and modal blend with a rib-trimmed neckline and short puff sleeves with a ribbed trim.
Blouse in an airy cotton weave with a round neckline, opening and concealed button at the back of the neck and short puff sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs.
Sleeveless top in satin with a lace trim in a narrow cut at the top with an opening at the front, and shoulder straps that tie at the back of the neck.
Swim pants and a swim top in UV-protective fabric. Patterned top with long raglan sleeves. Bottoms with a frill at the top and lined gusset. UPF 50.
Short dress in a crinkled, patterned viscose weave with a V-neck and decorative buttons at the top. Short sleeves with a tie detail, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Knee-length shorts in stretch cotton twill with a drawstring waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, back pockets and zipped leg pockets.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a zip fly, concealed hook-and-eye fastening, and regular waist with concealed elastication. Side pockets, fake back pockets and tapered legs.
Lined swimsuit with a matching hairband. Swimsuit with a flounced trim around the neckline and flounce-trimmed shoulder straps. Hairband with a knot at the front and covered elastication at the back.
Trainers in cotton canvas with a padded edge, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings, canvas insoles and rubber soles.
Push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastener at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a narrow collar, buttons down the front and yoke at the back. Cap sleeves and a rounded hem.
Knee-length dress in a viscose crêpe weave with a small stand-up collar and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a narrow, detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Sleeveless, A-line dress in airy, patterned chiffon with narrow, braided shoulder straps and a braided trim around the neckline and armholes. The dress lining is made from recycled polyester.
Poncho in a soft knit containing some wool with open sides. Length at the front and back 80 cm.
Long-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and short slits in the sides.
Long-sleeved body in lustrous jersey with a V-neck at the top, draping on the front and sleeves, a seam at the waist and a lined gusset with press-studs.
Straight-cut top in airy jersey crêpe with a boat neck and short sleeves with pleated trims.
Imitation leather sandals with an adjustable hook and loop fastening at one side. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles.

Calf-length dress in a broderie anglaise cotton weave with a high collar and opening with a button at the back of the neck. Gathers at the shoulders and wide, balloon sleeves with concealed elastication and a frill trim at the cuffs. V-neck jersey underdress with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Ballet pumps with an elastic strap over the foot. Satin insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Sleeveless romper suit in soft cotton jersey with press-studs down the front and short legs with sewn-in turn-ups.
Top in patterned viscose jersey with a narrow, elasticated seam under the bust and a V-neck with ties at the top. Yoke with gathers at the shoulders and back, and 3/4-length sleeves.
Long-sleeved cardigan in a soft, loose knit with no buttons. The polyester content of the cardigan is recycled.
Triangle bikini top with removable inserts and double, adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps that cross at the back. Adjustable fastening at the back and an elasticated trim at the hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details and a zip fly. Metal wallet chain with a carabiner hook that fastens to a loop on the back pocket with a keyring.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist and decorative gathers at the front.
Jersey-lined joggers in a cotton weave with elasticated ribbing and a decorative drawstring at the waist, side pockets and a back pocket. Legs with shaping seams at the knees and ribbed hems.
Round-necked T-shirt in sturdy cotton piqué.
Shorts in soft, Tencel™ lyocell denim with a high waist that is elasticated at the back and has a tie detail at the front. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and short, wide legs.
Shirt in soft, gently draping silk with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, waffle-knit cotton with a small appliqué at the hem and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless dress in printed cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.

Short wrap dress in airy chiffon with a glittery all-over sequin pattern. V-neck at the front, long puff sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a seam at the waist with a tie and an asymmetric skirt with a flounced hem. Lined.
Straight-cut top in a crêpe weave with a V-neck and wide ties at the neck. The polyester content of the top is partly recycled.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Short, straight dress in a Tencel™ lyocell and silk weave containing glittery threads. Draped style with an opening and concealed zip at the back and covered button at the back of the neck, and long raglan sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs in a contrasting colour. Lined.
Aviator-style sunglasses with metal and plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.

Soft toy in soft faux fur with embroidery and shimmering details and appliqués. Glittery detachable wings in felt and a removable satin dress that has a skirt with a layer of patterned tulle. Size approx. 21x32 cm.

Dungaree shorts in an airy, patterned cotton weave with a flounced trim at the sides of the bib and flounce-trimmed straps with buttons at the front. Elastication at the waist and hems, and press-studs at the crotch. Lined.

Short sports shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, mesh key pocket in the waistband and short slits at the hems. The polyester content of the shorts is partly recycled.
T-shirts in soft, organic cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Straight-cut top in cool viscose jersey with a sightly wider neckline, short sleeves and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Wide T-shirt in cotton jersey with gently dropped shoulders and a chest pocket.
